sentences.en: ‘But what shall I do?’ Bernard wailed.
sentences.cn: “但我该怎么办呢？”伯纳德哭喊道。

sentences.en: Compare cry, sob, weep, wail and whimper.
sentences.cn: 试比较cry 、 sob 、 weep 、 wail、whimper这 五个词.

sentences.en: Don't wail up for me. I may be back after midnight.
sentences.cn: 你不用等我了, 我也许要午夜以后才会回来.

sentences.en: From two blocks over he could hear the thin wail.
sentences.cn: 他从两条街以外的地方就能听到那微弱的哭泣声.

sentences.en: He rushed out; he thought he heard a mournful wail.
sentences.cn: 他走出门去, 耳边顿时起了一阵悲惨的叫声.

sentences.en: His sister, conscious of having been robbed of something, had set up a feeble wail.
sentences.cn: 他妹妹这时意识到有东西给抢走了, 软弱地哭了几声.

sentences.en: I heard the wail of a police siren.
Newborn babies begin their life with a wail.
sentences.cn: 新生儿痛哭一声便开始了他们的生命.

sentences.en: NIV Cross over to Tarshish ; wail , you people of the island.
sentences.cn: 6[和合]推罗人哪!你们当过到他施去. 沿海的居民哪!你们都当哀号.

sentences.en: Primrose, stupefied by tiredness, began to wail that she was hungry.
sentences.cn: 普丽姆罗丝累得精神都有些恍惚了，开始哭着说她饿了。

sentences.en: She heard the sirens scream their unearthly wail.
sentences.cn: 她听到警报器发出可怕的尖叫声。

sentences.en: She would go into a trance and wail her incantations to the spirits.
sentences.cn: 她会神志恍惚,哀声向幽灵念咒语.

sentences.en: The breath went out of her in a wail, her body shook with violent sobbing.
sentences.cn: 她恸哭失声, 整个身子都随着剧烈的抽泣发起抖来.

sentences.en: The child started to wail when the nurse came over with a syringe.
sentences.cn: 当护士拿着注射器走过来时,孩子便嚎啕大哭起来.

sentences.en: The wail of the bagpipe could be heard in the distance.
sentences.cn: 远远地能听到风笛的呜咽。

sentences.en: The women began to wail in mourning.
Wail, you ships of Tarshish; your fortress is destroyed!
sentences.cn: 他施的船只都要 哀号.因为你们的保障变为荒场.

sentences.en: Wails of grief were heard as visitors filed past the site of the disaster.
sentences.cn: 当来访者们列队走过灾难现场时听见阵阵悲痛的哀号声。

trans.tran_cn: vi大声哀号，恸哭；呼啸，尖啸
trans.tran_en: to say something in a loud, sad, and complaining way
